channel.title: Court Wizard - Rework Ideas
channel.description:
Court Wizard Unlimited Night Use: Crystal Ball - Chose Three Players, if all players are part of the Blue Dragon you will be notified. If this ability succeeds, it becomes unavailable until one of the chosen players dies.
Unlimited Night Use: Focus Mind - Chose Two players, if those players would be attacked or converted tonight, they bleed instead. This bleed can not be prevented.
Sage: Unlimited Night Use: Weaken Sanity (Replaces Focus Mind) - Chose a Player, They will start bleeding and will falsely be told that this was due to prevented conversion/attack. This bleed can not be prevented.
